channel.title: 317 PI Connection problems
channel.description:
Okay, so I'm using a 317 PI base, I've jarred it all correctly everything loads up. The only problem is, it won't connect.
I've opened port 43594 on my vps, on the run.bat command screen thing it says it's connecting through 43594 which I know is default, I've edited the ip's in client.java in the client folder, all of this has been jarred correctly, the source is running, the client loads up completely. Yet I can't connect. Do you have any ideas?
5 + Rep to anyone who solves it.

item.title: 317 PI Connection problems
item.dc:creator: @heatrn11 heatrn11
item.description:
@heatrn11 wrote:

Just don’t work with PI anymore -.- it’s horrible, work with something more advanced like 562 +, shard or hypersion.

Read full topic

item.title: 317 PI Connection problems
item.dc:creator: @eyeownyew Eyeownyew
item.description:
@eyeownyew wrote:

Storm Powner:

you can’t connect to your own ip, make sure you have a client with ip 0.0.0.0 or 17.0.0.1, other players need the client with your ip so they can play

Leave, you have no idea what you’re talking about.

Also, it isn’t necessary to make two threads about a single topic. Try to refrain from doing so… -.-

Read full topic

item.title: 317 PI Connection problems
item.dc:creator: @Kidpaparoach Kidpaparoach
item.description:
@Kidpaparoach wrote:

Can you connect to the server on the same Pc that hosts it? If so your portforwording has been done wrong/your router is not capable of hosting and you should ask your ISP for a router which pf capabilities.

Read full topic
